casebody.data:
HOLLIN
v.
COUNCIL ON AGING. No. 79P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 8, 2007. Brent Adams, Dunn, Sheila Chavis, for Hollin.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of February 2007 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of February 2007."
